remarks: A subspace covered by the set of all vectors, when summed with an atom not under it, equals the set of all vectors.  ( ~ 1cvrjat analog.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)
statement:
l1cvpat.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
l1cvpat.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
l1cvpat.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
l1cvpat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
l1cvpat.c $e |- C = ( <oL ` W ) $.
l1cvpat.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
l1cvpat.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
l1cvpat.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
l1cvpat.l $e |- ( ph -> U C V ) $.
l1cvpat.m $e |- ( ph -> -. Q C_ U ) $.
l1cvpat $p |- ( ph -> ( U .(+) Q ) = V ) $.
